imdb.plot outline: Common people with something extraordinary to be told. A parenthesis in this characters everyday. Unknown people that invite us to discover a different perspective. Some of the most inhospitable sceneries and some of the most ordinary ones give context to 13 exceptional stories. A glance that discovers the less known realities, inspirational stories.
imdb.title: Así es mi vida
plot: There are stories that deserve being told, stories in close-up, everyone has something to say, only few deserve to be told. This is the raw scenario in this 13 episode series of intimate documentaries, reality in close-up.::Alejandro Aimetta, Corona San Pedro, Carlos A.

Common people with something extraordinary to be told. A parenthesis in this characters everyday. Unknown people that invite us to discover a different perspective. Some of the most inhospitable sceneries and some of the most ordinary ones give context to 13 exceptional stories. A glance that discovers the less known realities, inspirational stories.::Alejandro Aimetta, Corona San Pedro, Carlos A.
